title: Shakespeare’s Hamlet | The Gravediggers’ Conversation
description:
This recitation was given April 23, 2021.

A section of Shakespeare’s Hamlet which I memorized. This is Act V, Scene 1, Lines 1-63

Thanks to Rik for improving the audio.
